quotes.quote: Think about how audacious it is to really believe in yourself.
Daring ideas are like chessmen moved forward. They may be beaten, but they may start a winning game.
Daring greatly is being brave and afraid every minute of the day at the exact same time.
Dare to courageous in life.You have nothing to lose.
Daring to wear something different takes effort.
A single feat of daring can alter the whole conception of what is possible.
Daring greatly means the courage to be vulnerable. It means to show up and be seen. To ask for what you need. To talk about how you're feeling. To have the hard conversations
Dare to make it to heaven and in doing so, carry many people along! Be a soul winner!
All daring and courage, all iron endurance of misfortune-make for a finer, nobler type of manhood
Daring is the price of progress. All splendid conquests are the prize of boldness, more or less.
Daring a greater life is a divine act.
Daring to set boundaries is about having the courage to love ourselves, even when we risk disappointing others.
Be daring to push your ideas forward.
Daring also means to act, however, and if you are not willing to act, then you have already lost the game.
Daring soul has five diaries; gratitude, work, inspirational, prayer and language diaries.
Every daring attempt to make a great change in existing conditions, every lofty vision of new possibilities for the human race, has been labeled Utopian.
If you are daring, no one can stop you.
Keep your heart and mind steady on your dreams. Ask God for guidance and wisdom to help you fulfill your dreams.
The most daring thing is to be yourself and to do exactly what you want to do at that point in time and not to be worried with what other people are doing or what's popular.
The power of daring anything their fancy suggest, as always been conceded to the painter and the poet.
People should always force themselves to do daring things.
In crises the most daring course is often safest.
Daring to dream means daring to live.

Be daring, be different, be impractical, be anything that will assert integrity of purpose and imaginative vision against the play-it-safers, the creatures of the commonplace, the slaves of the ordinary.
Daring to make a difference in today's youth-one page at a time.
Daring enthusiasm And abiding cheerfulness Can accomplish everything on earth Without fail.
Daring to me is having courage; it's a daily meditation to take breath and find strength.
Be audacious and cunning in your plans, firm and persevering in their execution, determined to find a glorious end.
Daring to dream what is deepest in our collective longings is what makes us most human and fully alive.
Who has a daring eye tell downright truths and downright lies.
A show of daring oft conceals great fear.
All glory comes from daring to begin
